case.title: VISITING LONDON DURING AUGUST... - m4w - 35 (W1)
case.text:
Hi there how are you!
I'm going to be visiting London during August and I'm looking for some nice female company for a night out. If you'd like to go for a nice meal, a couple of drinks or something different I'd love to hear back from you and lets see where it leads us. Hope to hear back from you soon. Alun x
